Articles.Content:
Is there any way to do this?

I notice it has a dV consumed value in ascent, can I just expend all the stages and fuel to get a decent value or is there some simpler way?

Or is there no other way than by hand?
I don't know if mechjeb can do it, but I know there is a spreadsheet somewhere on here that can be used to find it.

i use hand calculations in Excel.

and i try calculate stages mass before building craft.

but. it all work only with "fuel consumption bug" fixed.
